trans-unit.source: Represents a constraint that can be enforced on one or more <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以强制执行的上一个或多个约束<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A constraint is a rule used to maintain the integrity of the data in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 约束是用于维护<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>中的数据的完整性规则

trans-unit.source: For example, when you delete a value that is used in one or more related tables, a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> determines whether the values in the related tables are also deleted, set to null values, set to default values, or whether no action occurs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您删除一个值，用于在一个或多个相关表，<xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>确定是否相关表中的值也将被删除，设置为 null 值，设置为默认值，或是否会执行任何操作。</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>, on the other hand, just makes sure that all values within a particular table are unique.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>，另一方面，只是确保特定的表内的所有值都是唯一。</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据表约束](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A base Constraint constructor is not used.
trans-unit.target: 不使用基的约束构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Primary or unique key constraints are created by using the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> constructor, and foreign key constraints are created by using the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用创建主键或唯一键约束<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>构造函数，并且外键约束通过使用创建<xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>构造函数。</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which this constraint belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>此约束所属。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which the constraint belongs.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>约束所属。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which this constraint belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>此约束所属。

trans-unit.source: The name of a constraint in the <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的约束的名称<xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>返回的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>属性的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>类。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> name is a null value or empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>名称为 null 值或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> already contains a <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> with the same name (The comparison is not case-sensitive.).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref>已包含<xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>具有相同名称 （比较不区分大小写。）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of user-defined constraint properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取的用户定义的约束属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Extended properties must be of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的属性必须为类型<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Properties that are not of type <xref:System.String> are not persisted when the <xref:System.Data.Constraint> is written as XML.
trans-unit.target: 并不属于类型的属性<xref:System.String>时不会保留<xref:System.Data.Constraint>以 XML 形式写入。</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.PropertyCollection"></xref> of custom information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.PropertyCollection"> </xref>的自定义信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the constraint's <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置的约束<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which this constraint will belong.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>到将属于此约束。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>向应用约束。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>向应用约束。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>, if there is one, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>，如果有一个，以字符串形式。</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>

trans-unit.source: The string value of the <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>.</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>字符串值
